All requests, i.e. to resources or ifram.message: All requests, i.e. to resources or iframes, may contain tracking information on your current page or by redirecting you.

Allows clicking on non-clickable text-li.message: Allows clicking on non-clickable text-links to open them as normal links - Requires Event Delegation Mode.

Apply this CSS Style to cleaned links..message: Apply this CSS Style to cleaned links.

Clean all outgoing HTTP requests, instea.message: Clean all outgoing HTTP requests, instead of only top frame

Copy clean links from the context menu.message: Copy clean links from the context menu

Enabling this option will perform tracki.message: Enabling this option will perform tracking of cleaned links to easily whitelist their domains by right-clicking the toolbar button.

Reset options to their default values..message: Reset options to their default values.

Reset rules to their default values..message: Reset rules to their default values.

Set up a HTTP Observer to catch 3xx redi.message: Set up a HTTP Observer to catch 3xx redirections. For example, this should make possible to clear links hidden behind shortened URLs.

Switch to tabs opened by clicking links?.message: Switch to tabs opened by clicking links?

This extendes the context-menu with a Co.message: This extendes the context-menu with a Copy Clean Link entry to clear links before being copied to the clipboard.

This is a list of the last links cleaned.message: This is a list of the last links cleaned in this tab: original version above cleaned version. Red backgrounds indicate a link whose loading was denied. Whitelisting a link will prevent cleaning any further links originating from that domain.

This options causes non-http/s links to.message: This options causes non-http/s links to be ignored when checking for nested urls on them.

Toggle to enable or disable the extensio.message: Toggle to enable or disable the extension.

When you open a link in a new tab, switc.message: When you open a link in a new tab, switch to it immediately. This copies the same-named browser preference, that can not be accessed at present.

Whether the target attribute on links sh.message: Whether the target attribute on links should be checked and respected.

addon_description.message: Converts obfuscated/nested links to genuine clean links
